pages.text: Each dimension in Requiem has its own set of bosses that must be defeated to progress to the next.$(br2)Here, you will learn how to reach them.

pages.title: The Overworld
pages.text: These bosses must be defeated in the $(2)Overworld$() to access the $(4)Nether$().

pages.title: The Bellringer
pages.text: A powerful grave spirit heeding those who call it, the $(3)Bellringer$() must be summoned through the ringing of its ritual bell.

pages.title: Dame Fortuna
pages.text: Always willing to play a game of chance, $(4)Dame Fortuna$() can be brought forth with an invitation to take part in a match.

pages.title: Rosalyne
pages.text: The final obstacle in your reaching the Nether, $(2)Roysaline$() awaits the presentation of her key.

pages.title: The Nether
pages.text: These bosses must be defeated in the $(4)Nether$() to access the $(3)Twilight Forest$().

pages.title: Ignis
pages.text: $(8)Ignis$() sleeps within its citadel.$(br2)It awaits the day the ashes of one of its guards are placed upon its altar so it can finally face the champion it longs for.$(br2)An Eye of Flame can be crafted to aid in finding its citadel.

pages.title: Netherite Monstrosity
pages.text: The $(6)Netherite Monstrosity$() sits inactive in the forge of its creation, waiting for someone to claim its key piece.$(br2)An Eye of Monstrosity can be crafted to aid in finding its forge.

pages.title: The Wither
pages.text: $(5)The Wither$() is a beast needing no introduction.$(br2)Bring it forth and kill it to get one step closer to reaching the Twilight Forest.

pages.title: The Twilight Forest
pages.text: These bosses must be defeated in the $(3)Twilight Forest$() to access the End.$(br2)Unlike the other dimensions, progression in the $(3)Twilight Forest$() is completely linear.

pages.title: Naga
pages.text: $(2)Naga$() awaits a seeker in its grand maze.$(br2)Find this maze and show it the error of its ways.

pages.title: The Lich
pages.text: Once the Naga has been slain, the magical shield protecting the $(3)Lich's$() tower will drop.$(br2) Enter the tower and meet the $(3)Lich$() firsthand.

pages.title: The Hydra
pages.text: With a scepter in hand, you may dispel the obstacles of the fire swamp and come upon the $(4)Hydra's$() lair.$(br2)Pour the $(4)Hydra's$() fiery blood upon some Ender Pearls and finally, the End may be reached.

pages.title: The End.
pages.text: It is unknown what awaits in the End.
